sources.title: Melody Parade
sources.description: Title: Melody Parade Summary: A busboy at a nightclub sets out to make sure that the pretty blonde hatcheck girl gets the singing career she's always wanted. Directed by: Arthur Dreifuss Actors: Mary Beth Hughes, Eddie Quillan, Tim Ryan, Mantan Moreland Production Company: Monogram Pictures Release Date: 27 August 1943 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A busboy at a nightclub sets out to make sure that the pretty blonde hatcheck girl gets the singing career she's always wanted.

metadata.Plot: A busboy at a nightclub sets out to make sure that the pretty blonde hatcheck girl gets the singing career she's always wanted.
metadata.Actors: Mary Beth Hughes, Eddie Quillan, Tim Ryan
